meta.title: About Us - MAM Center Equestrian Club
meta.description: Discover the story of MAM Center, Kurdistan's premier equestrian destination. Learn about our passion for horses, our stunning mountain location, and our commitment to excellence.
meta.keywords: about MAM Center, equestrian center Iraq, horse riding Kurdistan, MAM Center story

vision.title: Where Dreams Meet Horizons
vision.subtitle: Our journey began with a simple belief
vision.story: At MAM Center, we believe that the bond between humans and horses is one of nature's most beautiful connections. Founded with a passion for equestrian excellence and a deep love for Kurdistan's stunning landscapes, we created a sanctuary where riders of all levels can discover the magic of horse riding. Our mission is to share this transformative experience with everyone who walks through our gates.

horsesStories.title: Our Beloved Horses
horsesStories.subtitle: Meet the hearts of MAM Center

spirit.story: Spirit has a gentle soul that calms even the most nervous riders. He seems to understand exactly what each person needs, providing confidence with every gentle step.
spirit.funFact: Spirit once helped a young rider overcome their fear of horses in just one session. He stood perfectly still while they built up the courage to approach him.

thunder.story: Thunder is our magnificent show jumper who inspires advanced riders to push their limits. His powerful build and graceful movements make every ride feel like flying.
thunder.funFact: Thunder has won 12 regional jumping competitions and loves to show off his skills during our annual exhibition events.

lucky.story: Lucky earned her name by surviving a difficult journey before finding her forever home with us. Her resilience and affectionate nature make her a favorite among children and beginners.
lucky.funFact: Lucky has an incredible memory - she remembers and greets riders she hasn't seen in months with excited whinnies!

theLand.title: Our Land
theLand.subtitle: Nestled in the heart of Kurdistan's mountains
theLand.description: MAM Center is blessed with a location that feels like it was chosen by the horses themselves. Surrounded by the majestic mountains of Kurdistan, our trails offer breathtaking views that change with the seasons. The fresh mountain air, the golden sunlight streaming through the peaks, and the peaceful sounds of nature create the perfect backdrop for the equestrian experience.

summer.title: Summer Adventures
summer.description: Golden mornings on mountain trails, refreshing rides through valleys, and sunset sessions that paint the sky in warm hues.

winter.title: Winter Wonder
winter.description: Snow-capped peaks create a magical backdrop for indoor training sessions and peaceful moments in our heated lounge area.
